lead_paragraph: Germany's Federal Cartel Office wants to introduce a "no single buyer" rule when it awards broadcasting rights for the 2017/2018 Bundesliga football season, potentially dealing a blow to Sky Deutschland, Germany's Frankfurter Allgemeine Zeitung said.

headline.print_headline: German Cartel Office Seeks Bundesliga Broadcast Rights Reform-FAZ
headline.main: German Cartel Office Seeks Bundesliga Broadcast Rights Reform-FAZ
